title: example
ingredients: 1 tortilla (warmed for 10 sec),1/4 cup warm corn,1/2 thin sliced red pepper,pinch of pepper and salt, spoonful of sour cream
instructions: 1. place tortilla in plate and place aside,2. take half-sliced pepper and put in small bowl,3. take pan and put on medium-low heat,4. pour oil in pan once heated,5. place pepper in pan and saute for 5 minutes,6. take peppers out and place aside,7. take sour cream and place in center of tortilla (or spread it),8. take sauteed peppers and place on top of sour cream,9. take corn and place on peppers,10. add a pinch of salt and pepper, roll up and serve!
